title: Bowl, "B/V", 1988
markings: Marks: On underside of porcelain: "2-89" and "[line crossed by half-moon] mark / B V (maker's mark)."
dimensions:
12.5 cm (4 15/16 in.)
diameter at lip: 25 cm.
creditline: Museum purchase from Decorative Arts Association Acquisition Fund
description: Bowl of cast polyester outer shell, containing hemispherical ovoid porcel- ain liner. Flat base, straight sides flared outward at extreme angle toward flat broad rim. Cast orange transparent polyester; white porcelain liner with interior glazed turquoise.

tombstone.epitaph:
Bowl, "B/V", 1988.
1988. plastic (polyester), porcelain. Museum purchase from Decorative Arts Association Acquisition Fund. 1989-72-1.
